CONDITION: IF panel options = "Evenly Spaced Posts" = (Number of Fence Panels) + (short panel offcut panel length)
NAME: Panel - 1200H x 2400W

CONDITION: IF panel options = "Full Panels - 3000W" = (Number of full length Panels) + (Number of short length panels)
NAME: Panel - 1200H x 3000W

CONDITION: IF LEFT OR RIGHT RAKED PANEL
NAME: 1300H - 300 Step-Up

CONDITION: IF LEFT OR RIGHT RAKED PANEL
NAME: 1400H - 400 Step-Up

CONDITION: IF LEFT OR RIGHT RAKED PANEL
NAME: 1500H - 500 Step-Up

CONDITION: IF LEFT OR RIGHT RAKED PANEL
NAME: 1600H - 600 Step-Up

CONDITION: IF LEFT OR RIGHT RAKED PANEL
NAME: 1700H - 700 Step-Up

CONDITION: IF LEFT OR RIGHT RAKED PANEL
NAME: 1800H - 600 Step-Up

CONDITION: IF "Base Plated Posts" = Number of Posts - STD
NAME: Post - 1300L - Base Plated

CONDITION: IF "Cemented In Posts" = Number of Posts - STD
NAME: Post - 1800L - Cemented In

CONDITION: IF "Base Plated Posts" = (Post - 1300L - Base Plated) + (Post - 1900L - Base Plated)
NAME: Post Covers

CONDITION: IF post_options = "Cemented In Posts" = (Post - 1800L - Cemented In) + (Post - 2400L - Cemented In)
NAME: Fixing Kit - Dynabolts
